Summary: STATIONARY WHITE LIGHT,IRREDESCENT COLORS,BACK TO WHITE,STREAKED LEAVING LIGHT TRAIL,LIKE LETTER Z IN SKY,STOPPED ,SHOT UP STRAIT, INCREDIBLE SPEED,DISAPPEARED
divs: sighting details(approx.1975-76)it was the summer,i believe it was july,maybe, august.it was a warm evening.the sky was lit full of stars.i was in the park ,with a friend of mine.the park was in front of our house.so,that evening,my friend and i,decided to sit on a park bench(on its back rest)and we proceeded to imitate chickens(there cackling,etc..).we were kids!anyways,after a few minutes of cackling.i notice this stationary white light ball,in the sky, to my left,at say 70 degree angle to where we were.so,i yell out to my friend,in excitment,"hey,look at that!".we both were glued to this white light ball(that's what it looked like from the ground).the light started to oscillate,it changed colors...yellow,red,blue( a mix of those colors )they had a neon\irredescent glow to them .i was in a state of awe,mouth wide open,and looking.i believe my friend was in the same state of awe.the object stopped changing colors...returned to its white color,and proceeded to streak across the sky, above us,it went back and fourth,so fast, it left a light trail.it would go back and fourth,stopping on a dime.then,it did the same,but,diagonally,still connected to the previous light trail.it did the same thing,went back and fourth,leaving a light trail,and stopping on a dime.my eyes never left the white light ball,same with my friend.the object, continued to complete,what i described to people,as the letter z in the sky.it went so fast,that the first two light trails were still lit up.when the third line(if you will)to the letter " z " it scribed was finished,it stopped on a dime.it stayed stationary for a couple of seconds,then shot up...straight up,at incredible speed, and disappeared.i right away, broke it down to logic,even at that age.there were no clouds,for image projection.there was no light beam from ground to sky.there was no sound.there was no form to it,other than the white light ball.nothing could move that fast and stop on a dime.in the 70's people had modest homes,thus,no holographic machines.we ran to my house, told my dad,he said (along these lines)oh that's good.the next day.my friend tells me,that his parents said,"it was a plane!".i said to my friend,there was no noise,there was no clouds for image projection,nobody could afford a holograph machine,that planes could not move like that...back and forth,and stop on a dime...etc,etc...through the years,while telling this story...i had a hair raising moment.when describing the light trail that the object left behind,and the letter it resemmbled to up in the sky, "the letter z".i realized that looking from the ground up...its the letter " n ",and not the letter "z"(reading it from say, east to west in the sky,stretched out away from you looks like the letter "z",but viewing it, the way the object wrote\scribed it, south to north.,it is the letter "n" in the sky.. understand).if you take the letter "n" and put it above your head, it looks like the letter,that starts my family name.this is my second sighting...from my first to the second,there was wierd things,maybe around 6-7-8 years of age.things around my bed,short purple or blue hooded and other ones, long stringy,taller.i use to scream my head off,i guess nobody heard.i would wake up the next day and all was forgotten. i will submit my third sighting, shortly.i'm sorry, if all this seems strange,well,imagine seeing these things, and people think your out there.���������������
